raw_mentions:
Here are the extracted sentences that meet the criteria:

Nanosota-1A, -1B, and -1C bound to the RBD with increasing affinity (Kd - from 228 nM to 14 nM), confirming the success of affinity maturations.
Nanosota-1C-Fc had the highest RBD-binding affinity (Kd = 15.7 picomolar), ~3,000 times stronger than the RBD-binding affinity of ACE2.
